message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher than that.

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your perspective on the value, the  $20,000 price reflects the true worth of this product and its potential benefits for you. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the value you'll gain.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $17,000, but I'm still not convinced that's a good deal for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $14,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
